document_data.name: Laethla
document_data.mainbody: '''Laethla''' was a cook at the [[Eel Revealed]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: She was known by name to [[Arclath Delcastle]].
document_data.History: In [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}} Laethla was testing a new condiment, and she asked Arclath for his opinion. He liked its peppery spiciness, and thought it should result in plenty of drinks being ordered.
